document_data.mainbody: Fadheela was the daughter of Masud, a healer from Al Qahera in Raurin as of . She wore a blue caftan. Fadheela volunteered her fathers guestroom for Thormud Horn after Kiril Duskmourn was allowed into the elven enclave. She also helped Kiril introduce herself to the village, and got her sharing the story of her trip, despite the travelers surliness. She was taken aback when Prince Monolith appeared later during Kirils sendoff, though she didnt get a chance to talk about it.
